LayoutXML:
<layout>
  <tabs>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="Summary" />
      </text>
      <section>
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Case Information" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CASE_NUMBER" valign="top" fieldtype="1">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##case## Number" />
                </text>
              </col>
              <col req="1" fieldid="CASE_STATUSCODE" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Status Code" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="1" fieldid="CASE_OWNER" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##case## Owner" />
                </text>
              </col>
              <col req="1" fieldid="CASE_PRIORITY" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Priority" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CASE_CONTACTNAME" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##contact## Name" />
                </text>
              </col>
              <col fieldid="CASE_ORIGIN" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Origin" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="1" fieldid="CASE_OPPORTUNITY" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##Opportunity##" />
                </text>
              </col>
              <col req="1" fieldid="CASE_PRODUCT" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##Product##" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CASE_ACCOUNTNAME" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##account## Name" />
                </text>
              </col>
              <col fieldid="CASE_TYPE" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Type" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CASE_CATEGORY" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Category" />
                </text>
              </col>
              <col fieldid="CASE_REASON" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Reason" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="CASE_CURRENTOWNER" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Assigned To" />
                </text>
              </col>
              <col fieldid="CASE_ASSET" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##Asset##" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CASE_PARENT" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Parent ##Case##" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
      <section containscustominfo="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Other Information" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CASE_REPORTEDON" valign="top" fieldtype="4">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Reported On" />
                </text>
              </col>
              <col fieldid="CASE_CLOSING_DATE" valign="top" fieldtype="4">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Closing Date" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="1" fieldid="CASE_SUBJECT" colspan="3" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Subject" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CASE_DETAIL" colspan="3" valign="top" fieldtype="9">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Details" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" fieldid="CASE_SEVERITY" fieldtype="2">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Severity" />
                </text>
              </col>
              <col req="3" fieldid="CASE_UNREAD_EMAILS" fieldtype="10">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="New Emails" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Useful Links" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CASE_WEBINTEGRATION_LINKS" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="37" listingtype="0" fieldtype="0">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Web Integration URL Links" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="Activities" />
      </text>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Open Activities" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CASE_OPEN_ACTIVITIES" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="43" listingtype="3" fieldtype="40">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Open Activities" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Closed Activities" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CASE_CLOSED_ACTIVITIES" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="43" listingtype="4" fieldtype="40">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Closed Activities" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="solutions" />
      </text>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Solution Informations" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CASE_RELATED_SOLUTIONS" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="10" listingtype="36" fieldtype="40">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Solution Information" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="Collaboration" />
      </text>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Related Issues" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CASE_RELATED_ISSUES" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="19" listingtype="7" fieldtype="40">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Related Issues" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Related Requirments" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CASE_RELATED_REQUIREMENTS" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="52" listingtype="8" fieldtype="40">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Related Requirements" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="Contracts" />
      </text>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Related Contracts" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CASE_RELATED_CONTRACTS" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="56" listingtype="29" fieldtype="40">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Related Contracts" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="Discussion" />
      </text>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="##Case## Discussion" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CASE_RELATED_RESPONSES" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="53" listingtype="0" fieldtype="40">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##Case## Discussion" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="Attachments" />
      </text>
      <section showtext="true" containscustominfo="false">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Attached Notes and Documents" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" readonly="0" fieldid="CASE_RELATED_ATTACHMENTS" fieldtype="40" relatedtype="129" listingtype="0" deftype="0" defexp="" valign="middle" colspan="4" showlabel="false">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Attached Notes and Documents" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="##Notes##" />
      </text>
      <section showtext="true" containscustominfo="false">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Related Notes" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col req="3" readonly="0" fieldid="CASE_RELATED_NOTES" fieldtype="40" relatedtype="4" listingtype="5" deftype="0" defexp="" valign="middle" colspan="4" showlabel="false">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Related Notes" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="History" />
      </text>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="##Case## History" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CASE_HISTORY" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="9" listingtype="6" fieldtype="40">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="##Case## History" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
    <tab>
      <text>
        <lang lid="en" text="Child ##Cases##" />
      </text>
      <section showtext="true">
        <text>
          <lang lid="en" text="Child ##Cases##" />
        </text>
        <rows>
          <row>
            <cols>
              <col fieldid="CASE_CHILD_CASES" colspan="4" showlabel="false" relatedtype="9" listingtype="12" fieldtype="40">
                <text>
                  <lang lid="en" text="Child ##Cases##" />
                </text>
              </col>
            </cols>
          </row>
        </rows>
      </section>
    </tab>
  </tabs>
  <objects>
    <object type="9">
      <field name="StatusCode" label="Status"></field>
      <field name="Priority" label="Priority"></field>
      <field name="TargetSLA" label="SLA"></field>
      <field name="ReportedOn" label="Reported On"></field>
    </object>
  </objects>
</layout>
